description.p: Wildflower Belt is a small independent family business built on a love of high quality leather accessories. It was originally established in Dorset, but now operates from London.
WildFlowerbelt.com is an online store that aims to provide quality over quantity. We value our business on providing a quality product with fast and reliable customer service.
We offer a 30 day 100% money back guarantee, so if decide you donâ€™t like the Wildflower Belt as much as we do, get in touch and we will provide a full refund. No questions asked.
If you have any thoughts, we would love to hear your feedback on our product or services. Please don't hesitate to email us anytime at contact@wildflowerbelt.com
Thanks for your interest in our product.

seo.title: About | Wildflower Belt is an online store built aiming to provide the highest quality western belts and accessories.
seo.description: Wildflower Belt is an online store built on a love of high quality western belts and accessories. We are a small independent business, aiming to provide high quality, original products. Originally established in Dorset, and now operating from London we aim to provide the best customer service and value.
